naming.rule: Filename MUST equal dmCode; hyphens preserved as per DMC fields

referencing.rule: All DMs MUST include brexDmRef to DMC BWQ1-A-00-00-00-00A-022A-D
Cross-ATA refs (e.g., ATA-27) MUST be via dmRef with correct DMC

validation.rule: All XML MUST validate against Issue 6 XSD (no DTD)
Every DMRL entry MUST have a corresponding DM file
DMC MUST be unique within CSDB

process.rule: issueNumber increments on major changes; inWork "00" only for released
